cslibrary.cslibraryitems

Class Textbook

  • java.lang.Object
    • cslibrary.cslibraryitems.CSLibraryItem
      • cslibrary.cslibraryitems.Textbook

  • public class Textbook
extends CSLibraryItem
    Textbook is a CS library item containing information needed for a CS library's records.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class cslibrary.cslibraryitems.CSLibraryItem

    • Constructor Detail

      • Textbook

        public Textbook(java.lang.String nameIn,
                java.lang.String authorIn,
                int numPagesIn)
        New textbooks will set their name, author, and number of pages.
        Parameters:
        nameIn - Name for the textbook. Null names will be set to "Unnamed".
        authorIn - Author of the textbook. Null authors will be set to "None".
        numPagesIn - Pages in the textbook. Textbooks created with less than one page will have the number of pages set to 0, denoting the number of pages is unknown.

    • Method Detail

      • setAuthor

        public void setAuthor(java.lang.String authorIn)
        Set the author for the textbook.
        Parameters:
        authorIn - Author for the textbook. Null authors will be set to "None".

      • getAuthor

        public java.lang.String getAuthor()
        Returns the author of the textbook.
        Returns:
        Author of the textbook.

      • setNumPages

        public void setNumPages(int numPagesIn)
        Set the number of pages for the textbook.
        Parameters:
        numPagesIn - Pages in the textbook. Textbooks created with less than one page will have the number of pages set to zero, denoting the number of pages is unknown.

      • getNumPages

        public int getNumPages()
        Returns the number of pages in the textbook.
        Returns:
        Number of pages in the textbook. A zero value denotes the number of pages is unknown.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        String representation of the textbook. Returned String is of the form:

        NAME

        Status: AVAILABILITY

        Loan: LOAN_PERIOD weeks

        Age Recommendation: AGE_GROUP

        Author: AUTHOR

        Page count: PAGES

        Where NAME is the name of the textbook, AVAILABLITY is either "Unavailable" or "Available", LOAN_PERIOD is the number of weeks the textbook can be checked out, AGE_GROUP is the recommended age group for the textbook, AUTHOR is the author of the textbook, and PAGES is the number of pages if known, otherwise "Unknown".

        Overrides:
        toString in class CSLibraryItem
        Returns:
        String of the book.

      • alphabetizeBy

        public java.lang.String alphabetizeBy()
        Textbooks are alphabetized primarily by author, then name.
        Specified by:
        alphabetizeBy in class CSLibraryItem
        Returns:
        String in the form: "AUTHOR NAME".

      • ageRecommendation

        public java.lang.String ageRecommendation()
        Returns the recommended age group for the textbook. Textbook age group recommendations are as follows:

        50 pages or less: AGE_GROUP_ONE

        100 pages or less: AGE_GROUP_TWO

        400 pages or less: AGE_GROUP_THREE

        Unlimited pages: AGE_GROUP_FOUR

        Based upon the number of pages, returns the lowest age recommendation. If the number of pages is unknown, returns "No Recommendation".

        Specified by:
        ageRecommendation in class CSLibraryItem
        Returns:
        The textbook's recommended age group.

      • loanPeriod

        public int loanPeriod()
        Textbooks may be checked out for two weeks.
        Specified by:
        loanPeriod in class CSLibraryItem
        Returns:
        Number of weeks the textbook can be on loan.
